title: johnnybravo311
author: johnnybravo311
created_time: December 21, 2022, 02:44:56 PMLast edit: December 21, 2022, 03:02:36 PM by johnnybravo311
content: Do you know which e-wallets or online banks work with Bet365, like Verse or Zen? Does Zen still work?I need to withdraw to bank so I actually need online bank with IBAN, I used Verse before but bet365 does not allow to withdraw to verse anymore

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: Quote from: johnnybravo311 on December 21, 2022, 02:44:56 PMDo you know which e-wallets or online banks work with Bet365, like Verse or Zen? Does Zen still work?That is a good question. A few years ago when I was using the Bet365 website they only had crdit card, bank transfer and PayPal option and did not accepted cryptos. If they changed this is great news, so I will be following this thread to know more about it

It would be shown on the gambling site withdrawal page. There should always be wire transfer if you have no other option. Using wire transfer, the withdrawal may take 2 weeks, if you have no other option, just go for it. Better to make use of one of gambling sites on this forum instead of the stress international fiat gambling site will make you go through while depositng or withdrawing, that is one of the reasons I am no longer actively using fiat gambling site ago. My deposit on crypto gambling sites are almost instantly.For Casino, you can visit https://livecasino.ioYou can visit sites like Trustdice, Rollbit, Roobet, Stake, Duelbit and some other ones. You can see their official thread on the gambling board. Do not go for 1xbit, it has negative trust from forum members.On the gambling board, read the official thread of each gambling site to know the services they are offering.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: johnnybravo311 on December 21, 2022, 03:02:15 PMI need to withdraw to bank so I actually need online bank with IBAN, I used Verse before but bet365 does not allow to withdraw to verse anymoreIn fact, bet365 supports several ways to withdraw funds. you can also try to choose a bank transfer if you have an IBAN, however, it is worth remembering that not all countries support the IBAN system, so if you send money to a country that does not do this, you just need a SWIFT code for this kind of transfer.

Does Zen still work?I need to withdraw to bank so I actually need online bank with IBAN, I used Verse before but bet365 does not allow to withdraw to verse anymoreBet365 should have a convenient way of withdrawal which will be easier for you to  deal with likewise their deposit method too. so i would say it will be best you go by their rules as stated in their terms and conditions so as not to go against  any rules as you have signed in their terms and conditions.Quote from: Daltonik on December 21, 2022, 05:44:13 PMQuote from: johnnybravo311 on December 21, 2022, 03:02:15 PMI need to withdraw to bank so I actually need online bank with IBAN, I used Verse before but bet365 does not allow to withdraw to verse anymoreIn fact, bet365 supports several ways to withdraw funds. you can also try to choose a bank transfer if you have an IBAN, however, it is worth remembering that not all countries support the IBAN system, so if you send money to a country that does not do this, you just need a SWIFT code for this kind of transfer.As said by this poster i  see no reason you should be requesting for external aid when hye have all the requirements for your easy withdrawal or is there something you are trying to do other than that.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: johnnybravo311 on December 21, 2022, 03:02:15 PMI need to withdraw to bank so I actually need online bank with IBAN, I used Verse before but bet365 does not allow to withdraw to verse anymoreHow did you deposit in the first place?I know Bet365 does not accept crypto deposits or withdrawals at the moment, before depositing money on any platform, I think it's common sense to first of all find out how to get your money out first, you don't first deposit and later, try to find out what their means of withdrawals are, for personal, I know that depositing to several casino that do not accept crypto is very easy with credit/debit card, but withdrawing is most times where the problem lies.Like Oshosondy said, Bet365 withdrawal options depends on your country of residence, so depending on the country where you live, some options might work and some might not, I will suggest you contact their customer support for proper guidance.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on December 21, 2022, 06:44:01 PMLike Oshosondy said, Bet365 withdrawal options depends on your country of residence, so depending on the country where you live, some options might work and some might not, I will suggest you contact their customer support for proper guidance. If a bet365 user is having money in his account already, he can click on withdrawal to see the withdrawal option that are available. I noticed that the withdrawal options can be lesser than the deposit options. Like in my country, only wire transfer was available the last time that I withdraw money from the gambling site, but more options are available for withdrawal from some another countries, especially in country like England.

comments.author: johnnybravo311
comments.body: I deposited with Verse card. I used to get withdrawals through Bank Wire using my Verse account with IBAN but few days ago when I tried again bet365 says that I cannot use this bank account to withdraw and most real banks in my country rejects money from bet365, so just looking for alternatives lol. But they let me choose the country of bank when withdrawing so just thought maybe you know some more online banks that works and accepts funds from bet365

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: johnnybravo311 on December 21, 2022, 07:14:14 PM<cut>Please note that this forum is primarily devoted to Bitcoin-related (and other cryptocurrency-related) discussions. Most of us who enjoy gambling use gambling platforms that accept deposits and withdrawals in cryptocurrencies. Since BET365 is not one of those casinos, you may have more success in finding the answer to your question on another online gambling forum or on social media.

comments.body: Quote from: johnnybravo311 on December 21, 2022, 03:02:15 PMI need to withdraw to bank so I actually need online bank with IBAN, I used Verse before but bet365 does not allow to withdraw to verse anymoreIf you want to know about a bank that supports international transfer with IBAN number, I think you can try Payoneer. Create a Payoneer account and from the online banking option you will get a bank account and IBAN number of that bank too.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: johnnybravo311 on December 21, 2022, 03:02:15 PMI need to withdraw to bank so I actually need online bank with IBAN, I used Verse before but bet365 does not allow to withdraw to verse anymore^ I wonder why you did not ask directly their support team regarding this matter. You freely contact them and ask which online bank they are supported by since this question is indeed very common. Bet365 is non-crypto supported and I am sure because of their legalities, if they have an ANN thread here we can answer your question, remember this is a BTC/crypto community, most popular gambling casino that accepts BTC and other cryptos will usually easy to recognize. I don't know what is the reason why Bet365 still now did not accept BTC as a mode of payment, it would be easy to deposit, and there is no link your account to any of your bank accounts.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Quote from: mak013 on December 22, 2022, 07:05:15 AMQuote from: Oshosondy on December 21, 2022, 07:11:18 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on December 21, 2022, 06:44:01 PMLike Oshosondy said, Bet365 withdrawal options depends on your country of residence, so depending on the country where you live, some options might work and some might not, I will suggest you contact their customer support for proper guidance. If a bet365 user is having money in his account already, he can click on withdrawal to see the withdrawal option that are available. I noticed that the withdrawal options can be lesser than the deposit options. Like in my country, only wire transfer was available the last time that I withdraw money from the gambling site, but more options are available for withdrawal from some another countries, especially in country like England.I`m not a bet365 user but several times i saw the problem that it is impossible to withdraw money if you haven`t deposited money in the same way. May be the OP just need to deposit some small sum firstly to prove that it is his wallet?The same time @Daltonik posted enough choices to withdraw.This is a common requirement that we must do to withdraw money because it also happens in crypto casinos that we often use to gamble.But if I were him, I don't want to withdraw the money directly to my bank because the bank will check the transaction first and will make sure that everything is according to the applicable procedures. If your country allows gambling, I think it will be safe and the shipping process will continue until it is finished. But if not, the bank may ask a few things before they can complete the process. Maybe sending the money to Paypal, Skrill, or some other method is safer than sending it directly to the bank but I don't know.But indeed, asking for customer service is the best way not to violate their rules.
